name: Ext_R5_MessageHeader_author
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MessageHeader.author for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MessageHeader.author from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageHeader|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The logical author of the message - the personor device that decided the described event should happen. When there is more than one candidate, pick the most proximal to the MessageHeader. Can provide other authors in extensions.
element.comment: `MessageHeader.author` maps to R4B `MessageHeader.author`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
